revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Shoal Cave |image = [[File:Shoal Cave.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Shoal Cave. |tokens = 30,000 |location = On Route 125, north of Mossdeep City. }} '''Shoal Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 490,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || colspan=2 rowspan=6|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Spheal.png|40px]] Spheal |- | [[File:Tentacool.png|40px]] Tentacool |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp |- | [[File:Wailmer.png|40px]] Wailmer |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Snorunt.png|40px]] Snorunt || <center>1,900,000 || colspan=3|<center> N/A |- |}

<tab name="Debuff"> After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
